title: Replace the current female flash-card image with a full-stack development related image

requirements.text: Remove the current "female flash card" imagery from the portfolio UI and replace it with an image that is visually related to full-stack development (e.g., developer workstation, code editor UI, abstract web/app architecture, or modern tech illustration) while keeping the existing light SaaS theme and Hero layout intact.

quotes: the female flash card is not needded instaed change a pic related to full stck devlopemt

acceptanceCriteria: No "female flash card" image appears anywhere on the site after the change.

The Hero section's right-side image (currently /assets/generated/profile.dim_900x1100.png) is replaced with a full-stack development related image and still renders correctly across mobile/tablet/desktop.
The replacement image uses the same static-asset approach (served from frontend/public/assets/generated) and does not introduce new network calls at runtime.
The new image preserves existing styling/behavior in HeroSection (rounded card, subtle tilt/hover, parallax), with no layout shifts or broken aspect ratios.

constraints: Do not modify files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Keep the change limited to replacing the unwanted image and updating any references; do not alter the site structure, navigation, or backend behavior.
nonGoals: Changing copy/text content in the Hero section or other sections.
Adding new sections, new project cards, or changing existing GitHub URLs.
Any backend/schema changes related to contact submissions or admin tools.

edits: Replace the subject with a full-stack development themed visual in the same light premium illustration style (profile.dim_900x1100.png > profile-fullstack.dim_900x1100.png)
